attributes.action: Get rid of the conservatives, especially Boris Johnson and Matthew Hancock
attributes.additional_details: Remove conservatives, Boris Johnson wasn't fit enough to be mayor of London let alone primeinster, vote no confidence!
attributes.background: Remove the very corrupt govenment, give the power back to the people. We are not the world health organisation (Bill Gates) Guinea pigs. We should have freedom of choice. Let us live our lives without the masses being scaremongered into submission!!! Stop making laws under scrutiny, you make it up.
